page.shortlink: UX Repeating Sections Has row number
page.description: Specifies if the row number for the current row in the repeating section should be shown.

section.description: *[ui:Has row number]* defines whether or not row numbers should be shown in the repeating section. If you enable *[ui:Has row number]*, then you *[MUST]* insert a '[Row Number]' control in the repeating section. The 'Row Number' control can be found in the 'Defined Controls' section. You can watch [this video] for an example on how to add row numbers to a repeating section, or follow the guide below.

section.title: Inserting a Row Number in a Repeating Section
section.description: To insert a row number in a repeating section, follow the steps below:

step.description: Click the [...] box for the repeating section's *[ui:Has row number]* property.
In the *[ui:Display Row Count]* dialog, check the *[ui:Display row count?]* box.
Finally, add a 'Row Number' control to the repeating section.
